description:
'''Stanley Omah Didia''' (born 18 May 1997), known professionally as '''Omah Lay''', is a Nigerian singer, songwriter and record producer. Omah Lay came into limelight and  gained international recognition with his singles "Bad Influence", "Godly,‚Äù Understand," "[[Attention (Omah Lay and Justin Bieber song)|Attention]]," and "[[Soso (Omah Lay song)|Soso]]". He has won numerous awards including [[The Headies 2020|Headies]] in 2020 and 2023.

Omah Lay released his debut studio album ''[[Boy Alone]]'' in 2022, followed by a deluxe in 2023. The album received critical acclaim.
